org.springdata.cassandra.core

Interface BatchedStatementCreator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSaveOperation, DefaultDeleteOperation, DefaultSaveNewOperation, DefaultSaveOperation

    public interface BatchedStatementCreator
    Batched Statement Creator interface to create Statements that are using in Batch operations.
